meanings.definition: A tax or duty to be paid on a particular class of imports or exports.
meanings.sent1: The tariffs on foreign goods help protect local businesses.
meanings.sent2: The government imposed tariffs on steel imports to boost domestic production.
meanings.sent3: The tariffs on chocolate made it a luxury item for many.
meanings.sent4: She saw the tariffs as a toll booth for international trade.
meanings.sent5: The tariffs acted like a toll bridge, slowing down the flow of imported goods.

meanings.definition: A list of prices, duties, etc., or of goods for sale.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed a tariffs board with all the prices clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: The online catalog had a tariffs section for easy browsing.
meanings.sent3: The tariffs list was so long, it felt like reading a novel.
meanings.sent4: She organized the tariffs like a treasure map, guiding customers to the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The tariffs sheet was a roadmap to budget-friendly shopping.
